all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Thou shalt be diligent in preserving what thou hast, that thou mayest be a wise steward; for it is the free gift of the Lord thy God, and thou art his steward.
Doctrine and Covenants 136:27
Quote of the Day
"We are to use the gifts we have been given—time, talents, and blessings—to serve Heavenly Father’s children, especially the most vulnerable and needy."
Elder Dale G. Renlund | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
